#邏輯練習
```{r}
x5 <- c("台北市","新北市","高雄市")
greatTaipei <- c("台北市","新北市")

x5 %in% greatTaipei
!(x5 %in% greatTaipei)
```

```{r}
y5 <- c("女","男","女")

y5
y5=="女"
!(y5=="女")
```

#交集
```{r}
x5 %in% greatTaipei
y5=="女"
(x5 %in% greatTaipei) & (y5=="女")
```

```{r}
which((x5 %in% greatTaipei) & (y5=="女"))
```

#聯集
```{r}
x5 %in% greatTaipei
y5=="女"
(x5 %in% greatTaipei) | (y5=="女")
```

#反交集(兩個只有一個滿足)
```{r}
x5 %in% greatTaipei
y5=="女"
xor(x5 %in% greatTaipei, y5=="女")
!((x5 %in% greatTaipei) & (y5=="女"))
```

```{r}
which(xor(x5 %in% greatTaipei, y5=="女"))
```
